attributes.action: INSTRUCT MEDIATION BE ORDERED BY A COURT
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
FAMILY MEDIATION REGARDING CHILDREN NEEDS TO BE ORDERED BY A COURT !,

BEFORE COURT ACTION

FOR A SMALL FEE PAID TO THE COURT BY THE PERSON TAKING OUT THE ORDER,
SO THAT WHEN THE ACTUAL MEETING TAKES PLACE,
IT WILL MAKE A BIT MORE SURE THE INVITED PARTY ACTUALLY BOTHERS TO SHOW UP AND THAT THE ARRANGEMENT MADE IS ADHERED TOO!
AS FOR ANY PUNISHMENT, IT SHOULD BE USED AGAINST THEM IF A CONTACT ORDER THEN HAS TO BE APPLIED FOR .

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
